SetupChooseLauncherLanguage.message: Please select which language you want to use the launcher with.

SetupChooseGameLanguage.message: Please select which language you want to load the game with.

SetupChooseGamePath.message:
Please select the folder your game is installed in.
It should contain the folders "game" and "boot".

SetupGameDirectoryWarning.message: Game not found, it will be installed on login

SetupSteamNotice.message: Please check this box if you are usually launching the game using Steam.

SetupActDetected.message:
Advanced Combat Tracker is installed on your computer.
Do you want to launch it automatically when launching the game?

SetupActPathNotice.message: Please verify that this path is correct.

SetupDalamudNotice.message:
Do you want to enable the Dalamud plugin system?
This will add extra functionality to your game, such as RMT chat filtering and Discord notifications for chat messages or Duty Finder pops.

To configure these settings, please use the XIVLauncher settings menu and switch to the in-game tab.
Enabling this however could cause a false positive on your antivirus software, please check its settings and add any needed exclusions if you run into problems.

ErrorWarning.message: An error has occurred, please notify the dev team.

updatefailureerror.message:
XIVLauncher failed to check for updates. This may be caused by connectivity issues to GitHub. Wait a few minutes and try again.
Disable your VPN, if you have one.
If it continues to fail after several minutes, please join the discord linked on GitHub for support.

DalamudUnavailable.message:
Plugins are currently unavailable
due to a game update.

GamePathSafeguardError.message: Please do not select the "game" or "boot" folder of your FFXIV installation, and choose the folder that contains these instead.

GamePathInvalidError.message:
The folder you selected has no FFXIV installation.
XIVLauncher will install FFXIV the first time you log in.

CheckLoginInfo.message: Additionally, please check your login information or try again.

AutoLoginIntro.message:
You are enabling Auto-Login.
This means that XIVLauncher will always log you in with the current account and you will not see this window.

To change settings and accounts, you have to hold the shift button on your keyboard while clicking the XIVLauncher icon.

CheckBootVersionError.message: XIVLauncher was not able to check the boot version for the select game installation. This can happen if a maintenance is currently in progress or if your connection to the version check server is not available. Please report this error if you are able to login with the official launcher, but not XIVLauncher.

GameIsOpenError.message:
The game and/or the official launcher are open. XIVLauncher cannot patch the game if this is the case.
Please close the official launcher and try again.

PatcherAlreadyInProgress.message: XIVLauncher is already patching your game in another instance. Please check if XIVLauncher is still open.

EmailUsernameError.message: Please enter your SE account name, not your email address.

UidCacheInstallError.message:
You enabled the UID cache in the patcher settings.
This setting does not allow you to reinstall FFXIV.

If you want to reinstall FFXIV, please take care to disable it first.

MaintenanceQueueBootPatch.message:
A patch for the FFXIV launcher was detected.
This usually means that there is a patch for the game as well.

You will now be logged in.

LoginNoStartOk.message: An update check was executed and any pending updates were installed.

LoginNoOauthMessage.message:
Could not login into your Square Enix account.
This could be caused by bad credentials or OTPs.

Please also check your email inbox for any messages from Square Enix - they might want you to reset your password due to "suspicious activity".
This is NOT caused by a security issue in XIVLauncher, it is merely a safety measure by Square Enix to prevent logins from new locations, in case your account is getting stolen.
XIVLauncher and the official launcher will work fine again after resetting your password.

LoginNoServiceMessage.message:
This Square Enix account cannot play FINAL FANTASY XIV.

If you bought FINAL FANTASY XIV on Steam, make sure to check the "Use Steam service account" checkbox while logging in.
If Auto-Login is enabled, hold shift while starting to access settings.

LoginAcceptTermsMessage.message: Please accept the FINAL FANTASY XIV Terms of Use in the official launcher.

EverythingIsFuckedMessage.message:
Certain essential game files were modified/broken by a third party and the game can neither update nor start.
You have to reinstall the game to continue.

If this keeps happening, please contact us via Discord.

PatchInstallDisclaimer.message:
A new patch has been found that needs to be installed before you can play.
Do you wish for XIVLauncher to install it?

MaintenanceNotice.message: Maintenance seems to be in progress. The game shouldn't be launched.

DalamudIncompatible.message:
The XIVLauncher in-game addon was not yet updated for your current FFXIV version.
This is common after patches, so please be patient or ask on the Discord for a status update!

DalamudCompatCheckFailed.message:
Could not contact the server to get the current compatible FFXIV version for the in-game addon. This might mean that your .NET installation is too old.
Please check the Discord for more information.

GameIsOpenPluginLocked.message: The game is open, please close it and try again.

IntegrityCheckImpossible.message: There is no reference report yet for this game version. Please try again later.

IntegrityCheckFailed.message:
Some game files seem to be modified or corrupted. Please check the "integrityreport.txt" file in the XIVLauncher folder for more information.

If you use TexTools mods, this is an expected result.

If you do not use mods, please reinstall your game.

IntegrityCheckValid.message: Your game install seems to be valid.

EmailInfo.message:
XIVLauncher is free, open-source software - it doesn't use any telemetry or analysis tools to collect your data, but it would help a lot if you could send me a short email with your operating system, why you use XIVLauncher and, if needed, any criticism or things we can do better. Your email will be deleted immediately after evaluation and I won't ever contact you.

Thank you very much for using XIVLauncher!

ChangelogThanks.message:
XIVLauncher is free, open-source software supported by a variety of people from all over the world.
Thank you for sticking around!

ChatChannelSetupDescription.message:
Please enter if XIVLauncher should post to a channel in a server or to an user in DMs,
and their respective IDs.

HowToHint.message: How do I set this up?

ErrorExplanation.message:
An error in XIVLauncher occured. Please consult the FAQ. If this issue persists, please report
it on GitHub by clicking the button below, describing the issue and copying the text in the box.

GenericAddonSetupDescription.message:
Please select the application that should be started, any additional parameters and
if it should be ran as admin.

LoginBoxLoginTooltip.message: Log in with the provided credentials

LoginBoxWaitingForMaint.message: Waiting for maintenance to be over...

MaintenanceQueue.message: Wait for maintenance to be over

OtpOneClickHint.message:
Or use the app!
Click here to learn more!

ProfilePictureInputDescription.message: Please enter a character's name and world.

ChooseGamePath.message:
Please select the folder your game is installed in.
It should contain the folders "game" and "boot".

OtpServerCheckBox.message: Enable XL Authenticator app/OTP macro support

RunIntegrityCheckTooltip.message: Run integrity check on game files.

ChooseDirectX.message: Please select which DirectX version you want to use.

DirectX9Notice.message:
DirectX 9 mode is not supported anymore. It will still start, but you will not get support from
SE for any technical issues any additional XIVLauncher features such as Rich Presence and the
In-Game addon will not work.

ChooseLanguage.message: Please select which language you want to load the game with.

ChooseLauncherLanguage.message: Please select the launcher language, requires a restart.

LauncherLanguageHelpCtaLoc.message: Notice any mistakes? You can help out translating the launcher! Just click here!

LauncherLanguageNotice.message: A restart is required to apply the launcher language setting.

AutoLaunchHint.message: These are applications that are started as soon as the game has started.

AutoLaunchAddNewToolTip.message: Add a new Auto-Start entry that allows you to launch any program.

InGameAddonDescription.message:
These options affect the XIVLauncher in-game features. These features will be automatically
enabled if you are running the DirectX 11 version of the game, the version of the game is
compatible, and the checkbox below is ticked.

InGameAddonCommandHint.message: When enabled, type "/xlhelp" in-game to see other available commands.

InGameAddonChatDelayDescription.message:
Check for recently sent messages to avoid duplicates.
This allows for multiple users to use the same channel as a chat log.
Please set an appropriate delay in milliseconds below(e.g. 1000).

InGameAddonInjectionDelayDescriptionLoc.message: Delay the injection of the in-game addon. This allows you to hide it from e.g. OBS and Discord, since they will inject before it does.

UniversalisHint.message: Market board data provided in cooperation with Universalis.

UniversalisOptOut.message: Opt-out of contributing anonymously to crowd-sourced market board information

PluginsDescriptionLoc.message: These are the plugins that are currently available installed on your machine.

PluginsInstallHint.message: You can use the /xlplugins command in-game to install more plugins.

AskBeforePatch.message: Ask before installing a game patch

KeepPatches.message: Keep downloaded patches for future reinstalls

PatchAcquisitionMethod.message: Choose the method used to acquire patches. We recommend "ARIA(HTTP)".

Credits.message:
Made by goat. Special thanks to Mino, sky, LeonBlade, Wintermute, Zyian,
Roy, Meli, Aida Enna, Aireil, and the angry paissa artist!

Any issues or requests? Join the Discord or create an issue on GitHub!

License.message: Licensed under GPLv3 or later. Click here for more.

EnabledUidCache.message: Enable experimental UID cache (this will break on game updates!)

ResetUidCacheTip.message: Hold control while starting the launcher to reset the UID cache

EnableEncryption.message: Enable encrypting arguments to the client

AutoLoginHint.message: Hold the shift key to change settings!

ResetUidCacheHint.message: Hold the control key to reset UID cache!

BinaryNotPresentError.message:
Could not find the game executable.
This might be caused by your antivirus. You may have to reinstall the game.

NativeLauncherError.message:
Could not start the game correctly. Please report this error.

HRESULT: 0x{0}

MultiboxDeniedWarning.message:
You can't launch more than two instances of the game by default.

Please check if there is an instance of the game that did not close correctly.

AdminCheck.message:
XIVLauncher and/or FINAL FANTASY XIV are set to run as administrator.
This can cause various issues, including addons failing to launch and hotkey applications failing to respond.

Do you want to fix this issue automatically?

AdminCheckNag.message:
XIVLauncher is running as administrator.
This can cause various issues, including addons failing to launch and hotkey applications failing to respond.

Please take care to avoid running XIVLauncher as admin.

MacTypeNag.message:
MacType was detected on this PC.
It will cause problems with FFXIV; both the official launcher and XIVLauncher.

Please exclude XIVLauncher, ffxivboot, ffxivlauncher, ffxivupdater and ffxiv_dx11 from MacType.

GShadeError.message:
A broken GShade installation was detected.

The game cannot start. Do you want XIVLauncher to fix this? You will need to reinstall GShade.

PatchInstallerNotOpen.message:
Could not connect to the patch installer.
Please report this error.

PatchInstallerInstallFailed.message:
The patch installer ran into an error.
Please report this error.

Please try again or use the official launcher.

PatchManNoInstaller.message:
The patch installer could not start correctly.

If you have denied access to it, please try again. If this issue persists, please contact us via Discord.

DalamudAntivirusHint.message:
The in-game addon ran into an error.

This is most likely caused by your antivirus. Please whitelist the quarantined files or disable the in-game addon.

DalamudDotNet48RedistError.message: The XIVLauncher in-game addon needs the .NET Framework 4.8 to be installed to continue. Please install it from the Microsoft homepage.

DalamudVc2019RedistError.message: The XIVLauncher in-game addon needs the Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2019 redistributable to be installed to continue. Please install it from the Microsoft homepage.

DalamudVcRedistError.message: The XIVLauncher in-game addon needs the Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2019 redistributable and .NET Framework 4.8 to be installed to continue. Please install them from the Microsoft homepage.
